events.comment: Disable the scare tactic increase when Kinito is talking

parameters:
"You know, those 
are some nice 
apps you got 
there."

"You're doing a 
good job so far, 
keep it up!"

"Why don't we
go back to the
Best Friends"

"Analysis Hub
to catch up on
what we missed?"

"Just give me one
second to do
something really 
quickly."

"Welcome back to
KinitoPET's Best
Friends Analysis
Hub!"

"The hub is a
bit outdated
and doesn't
function"

"properly anymore,
so I had to
tinker with it a
bit."

"That means we are
going to do 12 yes
or no questions on
the All About You"

"Hey! Not nice!
I was having a 
good rest!"

"Hey! I was 
having a good 
rest!"

"Hey! I was just
about to doze
off!"

"Hey! I wanted to
take a quick nap!"
